Description: On I-64 West in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage.

Description: On I-64 in the City of Norfolk, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel West, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All west lanes are closed.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 130.5 in the County of Spotsylvania, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south left shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-464 at mile marker 4.7 in the City of Norfolk, near Main Street, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
